abstracts.cdata!:
The Third Power Project will include
            supply and installation of a single 250 MW oil-fired
            electrical generating unit and associated equipment at
            Tarbert, County Kerry, and of approximately 100 miles of 220
            KV transmission line and associated substation equipment.
